actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal Section 1123 of the Tax Reform Act of 1986, 26 U.S.C. 72(t), which calls for an additional tax on early distribution from qualified retirement plan.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the additional tax on early distributions from qualified retirement plans, including individual retirement accounts and annuities.

titles.title: A bill to repeal Section 1123 of the Tax Reform Act of 1986, 26 U.S.C. 72(t), which calls for an additional tax on early distribution from qualified retirement plan.
